item.title: Apple Arcade Launches 10 New Games: Final Fantasy, Skate City: New York, PGA Tour Pro Golf, More - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Apple Arcade Launches 10 New Games: Final Fantasy, Skate City: New York, PGA Tour Pro Golf, More

Date: 14 Jan 2025, Source: NDTV Profit Tech

Apple Arcade has expanded its offerings with the addition of seven new games, including popular titles like Final Fantasy and Skate City: New York, with no ads or in-app purchases.

  • New Games: Notable additions include Skate City: New York, Gears & Goo, and Three Kingdoms Heroes.
  • Upcoming Release: PGA Tour Pro Golf launches on Feb. 6, featuring official PGA locations.
  • Updates: The platform will see updates to existing titles, including new games like Word Wright and seasonal content in Hello Kitty Island Adventure.
  • Subscription Model: Apple Arcade costs $6.99 per month, with a one-month free trial available.
"Apple Arcade is available for $6.99 per month with a one-month free trial. A single subscription works for six people, and over 200 games are available."

With these new additions, Apple Arcade continues to enhance its gaming platform, appealing to a wider audience by offering diverse gameplay experiences.

item.title: Poco F7 Pro, Poco F7 Ultra Reportedly Listed on Indonesia Telecom Site; Could Launch Soon - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Poco F7 Pro, F7 Ultra Spied on Indonesian Regulator's Site Ahead of Launch

Publication Date: N/A

Source: Gadgets 360

The Poco F7 Pro and F7 Ultra are set to launch soon, following their appearance on Indonesia Telecom's certification site. The listings reveal their model numbers but no specific launch date from Xiaomi's sub-brand.

  • Poco F7 Pro is expected to be a rebranded Redmi K80.
  • Poco F7 Ultra is likely a rebranded Redmi K80 Pro.
  • Both devices have been listed with model numbers 24117RK2CG (F7 Pro) and 24122RKC7G (F7 Ultra).
  • Rumored specifications for F7 Pro include a 6.67-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC, and a 50-megapixel camera.
  • F7 Ultra might come with a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and a triple rear camera setup.
“The Redmi K80 series has been available in China since last November with a starting price of CNY 2,499.”

This upcoming launch highlights the Poco brand's effort to cater to various market segments with rebranded global variants that combine powerful hardware with competitive pricing.

item.title: Amazon Republic Day Sale is LIVE: Grab deals on OnePlus 13 series, Redmi 14C, and other newly launched phones - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Amazon Republic Day Sale is LIVE: Grab deals on OnePlus 13 series, Redmi 14C, and other newly launched phones

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Amazon’s awaited Republic Day Sale is officially live, offering huge deals and discounts on electronics, including newly launched devices like OnePlus 13 and Redmi 14C.

  • The sale offers discounts on the OnePlus 13 series starting from January 10.
  • Massive discounts and bank offers are available, including instant discounts and exchange offers.
  • Redmi 14C is available at a discounted price during the sale.
  • Upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25 series is available for pre-reservation.
“Grab the amazing deals before the sale ends.”

This sale presents an excellent opportunity to purchase the latest gadgets at reduced prices, enhancing the shopping experience for consumers this Republic Day.

item.title: 5 Reasons to buy Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra over Galaxy S25 Ultra - Hindustan Times
item.description:
5 Reasons to Buy Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Over Galaxy S25 Ultra

Date: January 14, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is set to launch soon, featuring upgrades like the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, but the Galaxy S24 Ultra still holds substantial value. This article outlines reasons why opting for the previous model may be more beneficial.

  • Similar titanium design: Both models feature a similar design, making their differences negligible.
  • Powerful performance and OS upgrades: The S24 Ultra remains strong with its Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor and offers extensive software updates.
  • Similar Galaxy AI features: The S24 is expected to support the upcoming AI features alongside the S25.
  • Proven camera performance: The S24 Ultra boasts a competitive camera setup, including a 200MP main camera.
  • Value for money: The S24 is significantly cheaper, offering great deals on platforms like Amazon and Flipkart.
“The Galaxy S24 Ultra is titled as the 'best flagship Android' of 2024.”

In conclusion, with comparable features and a lower price point, the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra presents itself as a smart purchase over the soon-to-launch Galaxy S25 Ultra.

item.title: Carl Pei to launch Nothing Phone (3) and ‘landmark’ device in 2025, leaked email confirms - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Carl Pei to Launch Nothing Phone (3) and Landmark Device in 2025

Date: January 14, 2025 / 10:32 IST

Source: Moneycontrol

Nothing has big plans for 2025. According to a leaked email from CEO Carl Pei, the Nothing Phone (3), which is set to be a flagship device, will launch this year. Alongside this, Pei hinted at a 'landmark' device. No specific details about this device were shared, but anticipation is high among Nothing fans.

  • The Nothing Phone (3) will be a flagship device.
  • A 'landmark' smartphone is expected in Q1 2025.
  • This marks the first flagship launch since the Phone 2.
  • Anticipation is building in the tech community.
“2025: Nothing’s Year of Innovation” - Carl Pei

With these announcements, 2025 is gearing up to be a significant year for the brand.

item.title: OPPO Find N5 could launch as OnePlus Open 2 in India, China launch in Feb - Business Standard
item.description:
OPPO Find N5 Set to Launch as OnePlus Open 2 in India and China

Date: Jan 14 2025 | Source: BS Tech

The OPPO Find N5 is expected to debut in China this February, with plans for a global launch as the OnePlus Open 2. It is anticipated to be the world's thinnest foldable flagship smartphone, featuring cutting-edge specifications.

  • OPPO is expected to rekindle its foldable phone line with the Find N5 after a year-long hiatus.
  • Designed with a titanium build, it is said to have an IPX8 rating for water resistance.
  • The smartphone is rumored to come with a triple-camera setup incorporating a Hasselblad periscope zoom lens.
  • Key specifications include a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, a 6,000mAh battery, and support for speedy charging options.
“The OPPO Find N5 is touted as the world's thinnest foldable flagship device.”

In conclusion, the OPPO Find N5 represents a significant addition to the foldable smartphone market, with features that emphasize both durability and performance.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes for January 14: Win gloo wall skins, pets, and other rewards today - The Times of India
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 14: Win Gloo Wall Skins and More

Date: January 14, 2023 Source: Gaming News

Players of Garena Free Fire MAX can take advantage of special redeem codes to obtain exclusive items including gloo wall skins, pets, and other rewards today.

  • Redeem codes provide players with access to various in-game items.
  • Players must act quickly as redeem codes may have limited availability.
  • The promotion includes unique skins and pets that enhance gameplay experience.
“These codes allow players to personalize their gameplay and stand out in matches.”

Players are encouraged to redeem their codes as soon as possible before they expire.

item.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra: Everything we know so far about Samsung’s next flagship smartphone - The Indian Express
item.description:
Galaxy S25 Ultra: Everything we know so far about Samsung’s next flagship smartphone

Publication Date: January 15, 2025

Source: Indian Express

Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy S25 series on January 22, with the Galaxy S25 Ultra expected to be a highlight due to its impressive features and design similarities to its predecessor.

  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra maintains a similar design to the Galaxy S24 Ultra but with minor tweaks such as a boxier frame.
  • It will feature a massive 6.9-inch flat screen with WQHD+ resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • A quad-camera setup includes a 200 MP primary camera and an upgraded 50 MP ultra-wide-angle lens.
  • Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy, it will come with up to 1 TB of storage and 12 GB of RAM.
  • Ships with Android 15-based OneUI 7, promising long-term updates.
  • Expected to maintain the same 5,000 mAh battery and 45W fast charging as its predecessor.
  • Estimated price range is between Rs 1,20,000 and Rs 1,30,000.
“Samsung seems to be playing it safe when it comes to battery and fast charging.”

The Galaxy S25 Ultra is generating buzz ahead of its launch, indicating its potential as a leading smartphone of 2025.

item.title: Republic Day 2025: 5 tech products to get from Amazon and Flipkart during the sale - India TV News
item.description:
Republic Day 2025: 5 tech products to get from Amazon and Flipkart during the sale

Date: January 2025
Source: India TV

The Republic Day Sale is approaching, featuring significant discounts on a variety of tech gadgets from Amazon and Flipkart. With a focus on both smartphones and non-smartphone tech, this sale promises great opportunities for shoppers.

  • Samsung Essential Monitor S3: Rs 7,599 - A 24-inch monitor with Full HD resolution and 100Hz refresh rate.
  • OnePlus Buds 3: Rs 4,499 - Buds with 44 hours of battery life and noise cancellation features.
  • Motorola EnvisionX 43-inch 4K Smart TV: Rs 21,999 - Features QLED panel with Dolby Vision.
  • iPad (10th Gen): Rs 28,999 - A budget-friendly tablet with advanced capabilities.
  • Apple MacBook Air M2 (16 GB): Rs 79,900 - A sleek laptop ideal for students and professionals.

Grab these deals before they’re gone!

item.title: Poco X7 Pro vs Vivo T3 Ultra vs OnePlus Nord 4: Which is best phone to buy under ₹30,000? | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Poco X7 Pro vs Vivo T3 Ultra vs OnePlus Nord 4: Which is the Best Phone Under ₹30,000?

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: Live Mint

Poco has launched its latest smartphone, the X7 Pro, competing against the OnePlus Nord 4 and Vivo T3 Ultra in India, all within the sub-₹30,000 range. This article compares their specifications, features, and pricing to help consumers make the best choice.

Poco X7 Pro Specifications

The Poco X7 Pro features a 6.73-inch AMOLED display, powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra processor, and includes a 6550mAh battery with 90W HyperCharge. The camera includes a 50MP primary sensor.

Vivo T3 Ultra Specifications

The Vivo T3 Ultra boasts a 6.78-inch 3D curved AMOLED display and is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9200+ chipset. It offers a dual-camera setup and a 5500mAh battery with 80W fast charging.

OnePlus Nord 4 Specifications

The OnePlus Nord 4 comes with a 6.74-inch AMOLED display and is powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 chipset. It features a triple-camera setup and supports 100W SUPERVOOC fast charging.

Key Points

  • Poco X7 Pro: Ideal for gaming with a high refresh rate and fast charging.
  • Vivo T3 Ultra: Features a unique design with strong camera capabilities for low-light conditions.
  • OnePlus Nord 4: Promises long-term software support and exceptional performance.
“The Nord 4 is the first phone to receive the TÜV SÜD Fluency 72 Month A rating.”

In conclusion, each phone has unique strengths, making the choice dependent on user preferences for gaming, photography, or long-term software support.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 14, 2025: Unlock free and exclusive rewards - India TV News
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 14, 2025: Unlock free and exclusive rewards

Publication Date: January 14, 2025   |   Source: India TV News

Garena Free Fire MAX, a popular mobile game in India, continues to engage players by providing free redeem codes daily. On January 14, 2025, several new codes have been released, offering various in-game rewards to enhance the gaming experience.

Redeem Codes for January 14, 2025

The latest redeem codes with their corresponding rewards are as follows:

  1. FFNRWTQPFDZ9: Naruto Ascension + Rasengan + Gloo Wall – Hokage Rock
  2. FFMGY7TPWNV2: Naruto Emote – Ninja Run, Ninha Sign, Clone Jutsu
  3. NPFT7FKPCXNQ: M1887 One Punch Man Skin
  4. FFSP9XQ2TNZK: Naruto Evo Bundle + Rasengan Emote
  5. FFYNC9V2FTNN: M1887 Evo Gun – Sterling Conqueror
  6. FPSTQ7MXNPY5: Pirate’s Flag Emote
  7. FFWCX9TSY2QK: Winterlands Aurora Bundle
  8. PXTXFCNSV2YK: Legendary Paradox Bundle
  9. FFNYX2HQWCVK: M1014 Green Flame Draco Skin
  10. FG4TY7NQFV9S: Cobra MP40 Skin + 1450 Tokens

Note: Each code is valid for a limited time and can be redeemed only once.

How to Redeem Free Fire MAX Codes

To redeem the codes, follow these steps:

  • Visit the official Free Fire MAX rewards redemption website.
  • Log in using your Facebook, Google, Twitter, or VK account.
  • Paste the redeem code into the text box provided.
  • Confirm and click OK when prompted.
  • Your reward will be sent to the in-game mail section.

About Garena Free Fire MAX

Launched in 2020, Garena Free Fire MAX is an upgraded version of Free Fire, offering enhanced graphics, larger maps, better mechanics, and an improved user interface.

item.title: Nothing Phone 3 Launch Seems Confirmed For Early 2025: When You Might Get It - News18
item.description:
Nothing Phone 3 Launch Seems Confirmed For Early 2025: When You Might Get It

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: News18

Nothing has announced plans for the launch of the Phone 3, which is expected to debut in early 2025, possibly in March. The device is rumored to integrate AI features into its interface and apps.

  • The Phone 3 is speculated to launch in Q1 2025, with a likely release date in March.
  • It will be marketed as a flagship device with advanced UI capabilities utilizing AI technology.
  • Previous models like Phone 2a aimed at the mid-range market, suggesting a shift back to premium offerings.
  • Nothing plans to introduce Phone 3a and 3a Plus models later in 2025.
“Phone 3 will be a flagship phone and become a landmark smartphone launch in Q1 this year.” - Carl Pei, CEO of Nothing

The anticipation for the Nothing Phone 3 indicates the brand's intent to create a strong presence in the flagship segment, hoping to meet or exceed the expectations set by its predecessors.

item.title: Top Mid-Range 5G Smartphones You Can Buy In India - News18
item.description:
Top Mid-Range 5G Smartphones You Can Buy In India

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: News18

Buying a reliable 5G phone in the mid-range segment can be a tough task these days. So here's a list of models that you can consider.

Best 5G Smartphones To Buy In India

  • Motorola G35 5G: Priced around Rs 10,000, it features stock Android and a 5,000 mAh battery.
  • Samsung Galaxy M15 5G: Offers a 6.50-inch display and a 6000mAh battery with fast charging.
  • OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite 5G: Comes with a 6.72-inch display and 108-megapixel primary camera.
  • Redmi 13 5G: Features a 6.79-inch display and supports 33W rapid charging.
  • Moto G85 5G: Provides a curved display and is known for its gaming and multitasking abilities.
“Buying a reliable budget smartphone with 5G capabilities, things get a little complicated.”

These models are some of the best choices for those looking to purchase a 5G smartphone in India within a mid-range budget.

item.title: Urban Company hires banks for IPO, likely to file by March-end | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Urban Company Hires Banks for Upcoming IPO Expected by March-End

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Mint

Urban Company is preparing to file draft papers for a ₹3,000 crore initial public offering (IPO) by the end of March 2024. The platform has engaged major banks for this process.

  • Urban Company plans to file for a ₹3,000 crore IPO by the end of the March quarter.
  • Prosus-backed, the company is currently valued at approximately $2.1 billion as of June 2021.
  • Kotak Mahindra Capital, Goldman Sachs, and Morgan Stanley have been appointed as managers for the IPO.
  • The IPO will consist of both new and existing shares.
“The company has last valued itself at $2.1 billion. This move marks a significant step in its growth trajectory.”

In conclusion, Urban Company's upcoming IPO signifies its strategic growth move and potential expansion in the home services market.

item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: [CES 2025] A New Era of Personalized Appliances: Samsung Showcases Home AI Innovations - samsung.com
item.description:
Samsung Unveils Home AI Innovations at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Samsung Newsroom

At CES 2025 in Las Vegas, Samsung Electronics showcased its vision for the smart home with the introduction of Home AI, a suite of AI solutions designed for personalized living spaces.

  • Home AI includes features like personalized scheduling assistance powered by Bixby.
  • Bixby can manage household tasks like cleaning and laundry remotely when users are away.
  • Intruder detection and monitoring enhance home security via AI-powered appliances.
  • The exhibition highlights a focus on convenience, user experience, and robust security measures.
"Samsung’s vision of interconnected AI appliances that seamlessly integrate into the household reflects a forward-thinking approach to innovation."

The Home AI innovations aim to enhance convenience and efficiency in daily household management, indicating a new era in home automation.

item.title: Adobe launches new GenAI Firefly tool for retailers - TechTarget
item.description:
Adobe Launches New GenAI Firefly Tool for Retailers

Publication Date: January 13, 2025   |   Source: TechTarget

Adobe has introduced Firefly Bulk Create, a new generative AI tool designed to help retailers efficiently produce marketing content at scale.

  • Firefly Bulk Create automates repetitive tasks in the content production cycle.
  • The tool allows for resizing marketing assets, including background swaps using generated images.
  • Competitors like Google are also launching AI tools for retailer efficiency.
"[Firefly Bulk Create] gets the idea out of a creative mind and into exploration and iteration faster," said Liz Miller, Constellation Research analyst.

While beneficial for large retailers, questions remain on its value for medium-sized or small retailers facing budget constraints.

item.title: Google may redesign the volume UI in Android 16, and here's a first look - Android Authority
item.description:
Google May Redesign the Volume UI in Android 16: A First Look

Publication Date: November 2024   Source: Android Authority

Google is making significant changes to the volume slider and panel in the upcoming Android 16 update, transitioning from thick, pill-shaped sliders to a new design featuring thinner, continuous sliders with handles. The changes aim to align with Google’s Material Design 3 guidelines.

  • Google is working on a new design for Android’s volume slider and volume panel.
  • The new design replaces thick, pill-shaped sliders with thinner, continuous sliders with handles.
  • The launch date of this redesign is uncertain, but it is expected to appear in the Android 16 update.
“Its simplicity makes it easier to estimate the exact volume level of a particular volume stream.”

This redesign is part of a broader UI update expected in Android 16, which aims to enhance user experience across the platform.

item.title: Samsung expands Galaxy Ring sizes: New sizes 14 and 15 available starting January 22 - The Financial Express
item.description:
Samsung expands Galaxy Ring sizes: New sizes 14 and 15 available starting January 22

Publication Date: January 22, 2025 | Source: Financial Express

Samsung is set to expand its Galaxy Ring lineup by introducing new sizes 14 and 15, available from January 22. The larger sizes aim to cater to a broader range of users and enhance competition with other smart ring manufacturers.

  • New sizes 14 and 15 will be available from January 22, 2025.
  • Galaxy Ring to come in three colors: Titanium Black, Silver, and Gold.
  • Samsung aims to compete with Oura, which offers sizes 4 to 15.
  • Galaxy Ring to be accessible in 53 markets by February 2025.
  • Samsung is enhancing the Health app to support the Galaxy Ring with sleep improvement features.
“The addition of larger sizes ensures that more individuals, particularly those at the higher end of the sizing spectrum, can comfortably use the device.”

This expansion reflects Samsung's commitment to accommodating a wider customer base while enhancing product integration through health-focused features in its applications.

item.title: Samsung is adding two new Galaxy Ring sizes - The Verge
item.description:
Samsung Introduces Two New Sizes for Galaxy Ring

Publication Date: January 22, 2024

Source: Samsung News

Samsung is expanding the availability of its Galaxy Ring by introducing sizes 14 and 15, allowing more people to find their fit.

  • The new sizes will be available starting January 22nd.
  • Galaxy Ring sizes now range from five to 15, varying in availability by market.
  • The new sizes aim to compete with Oura, which offers its smart ring in sizes four to 15.
  • Current larger sizes 12 and 13 feature bigger batteries for longer life.
  • The launch will also see the Galaxy Ring sold in 16 additional countries from February 7th.
“Even if you’re able to slide the ring on, it could be hard to take it off again as your fingers swell.” - Victoria Song

With these additions, Samsung aims to cater to a wider audience and enhance user experience across different markets.

item.title: Apple iPhone 15 is available for Rs 36,199 on Flipkart in just 10 minutes; check exchange deal and bank o - The Times of India
item.description:
Apple iPhone 15 is available for Rs 36,199 on Flipkart in just 10 minutes; check exchange deal and bank offer

Date: Recent Date Source: Times of India

Apple's latest iPhone 15 quickly sold out on Flipkart, available at an introductory price of Rs 36,199. The device attracted significant interest due to attractive exchange deals and bank offers.

  • The iPhone 15 was available on Flipkart and sold out in just 10 minutes.
  • The price was set at Rs 36,199, which hinges on an attractive exchange deal.
  • Various bank offers were available to sweeten the purchase.
"The response to the iPhone 15 has been overwhelming, highlighting its demand in the market."

This quick sell-out demonstrates consumer enthusiasm for the latest iPhone model, especially with incentives like exchange deals and bank offers to make purchasing more accessible.

item.title: iPhone Users Facing Call Drop And Network Issues In India After Installing iOS 18 Update: Report - News18
item.description:
iPhone Users Facing Call Drop And Network Issues In India After Installing iOS 18 Update: Report

Last Updated: January 13, 2025, 16:37 IST

Source: News18

Many iPhone users had been looking forward to the iOS 18 update, but reports now suggest it has resulted in significant connectivity issues, including call drops and faster battery drain.

  • A survey indicates that 60% of iPhone users have experienced call drop and network issues post-update.
  • The survey received feedback from over 45,000 users, highlighting substantial concern about the update.
  • Network issues are impacting the use of OTT apps for calls, such as WhatsApp and Signal.
  • Despite the issues, 90% of those surveyed upgraded to the iOS 18 version.
  • Users are hoping for fixes in the upcoming iOS 18.3 update.
"6 out of 10 iPhone users are noticing network and call drop issues in the country."

The experiences shared by users indicate a significant impact of the iOS 18 update on their devices, emphasizing the need for Apple to address these issues in upcoming updates.
